title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan and pepper.
Drain pasta, mix with pancetta, then add egg mixture off heat.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or bake chicken until cooked.
Sauté onion in butter, add tomatoes and spices.
Add grilled chicken and cream, simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef served in a rich, creamy mushroom sauce over egg noodles.
instructions: Brown beef in butter, set aside.
Sauté onion and mushrooms.
Add flour, then broth, simmer.
Return beef, add sour cream, heat through.
Serve over noodles.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and ginger.
instructions: Heat oil in wok or pan.
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables, stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce, cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Decadent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served warm with vanilla ice cream.
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter.
Whisk eggs with sugar, add to chocolate mixture.
Fold in flour and salt.
Pour into ramekins, bake at 200°C for 10-12 minutes.
Serve immediately with ice cream.

title: Mediterranean Salad
summary: Fresh tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese with olive oil dressing.
instructions: Combine all vegetables and feta in a bowl.
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad, toss gently.
Let sit for 10 minutes before serving.
